name: react-auto-currency-converter
author: Achuth R Kumar achuthrkumar@gmail.com
description: A plug-and-play React component that automatically displays a numerical price in the user's local currency. It's designed to be zero-config for the frontend developer: simply wrap your app in the provider and use the component where you need a price displayed. The component handles geolocation, fetches the latest exchange rates from a dedicated backend, and gracefully falls back to a default currency (EUR) if anything goes wrong.
